member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_BINDING_A
member.summary: The HTTP_SERVICE_BINDING_A structure provides Service Principle Name (SPN) in ASCII.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_BINDING_A.Base
member.summary: An value, the Type member of which must be set to HttpServiceBindingTypeA.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_BINDING_A.Buffer
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer that represents the SPN.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_BINDING_A.BufferSize
member.summary: The length, in bytes, of the string in Buffer.
